column4: can you give me the wiki page for checkinstall I would like to read about that :)

and you did apt-get update right?
multiverse isn't in dfault sources.list, you have to add it (basically everywhere 'universe' is alone)
oh okay so where i get that info do you know? sure ya do :)

okay i will pastebin...then we can look at the same page :P
